text: The following is the list of Ambassadors and High Commissioners of Malaysia. High Commissioners represent member states of the Commonwealth of Nations and ambassadors represent other states. Note that some diplomats are accredited by, or to, more than one country. ==Current ambassadors of Malaysia== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Host country !! Appointed !!
